Hillman Community Schools will be closed on Monday March 16 until April 6, 2020. Information from the State is rapidly changing. At this point, like you, we have far more questions than answers! What we do know is that we are working hard to ensure that our students and staff have the resources they need during this difficult time.

March is Reading Month. Parents, take this opportunity to read more than ever with your students! How many books can you read together in three weeks? Go outside and enjoy the beautiful spring sunshine. Find some learning sources online to keep your students engaged in their education, even though we can't see them in the classroom.

Most of all, don't panic - the sky is not falling, and we can all work together to slow the progress of this COVID-19 virus and keep our most vulnerable community members safe and healthy.

We will continue to update you with information as it becomes available to us.

Superintendent,
Carl Seiter
